HelloLDO

Client:
London Designer Outlet

Work:
Brand development + year round ATL trans-media campaigns.

LDO have been helping keep London on point and stylish for over 5 years. As part of the Wembley Park estate, in the shadow of the stadium but never over-shadowed, the shopping centre is home to the biggest names in fashion and leisure wear alongside a 9 screen cinema and extensive F&B offering. Halo deliver year round brand development, ATL omni-channel campaigns as the retained agency of record.

Request a case study

They’ve reinvented the brand & reimagined our campaigns with a bold vision that is as creative as it is strategic.
Norman Black, Director of Marketing

Strategy / Thinking / Insight

Driving footfall, spend & frequency through social experience

In a world increasingly choosing online as the shopping experience of choice, LDO are bucking the national highstreet trends. WIth seasonal focused experiential driving activity throughout the outlet, it’s a leisure first retail approach that creates value. Combined with a simplfied, fashion led OOH campaign, we’re driving awareness, engagment & credibility in a highly competitive market.

33%

Sales growth YOY

2million

Visitors in 2018

11%

Av. spend YOY
